easy.description: Howdy Partner! Could you deliver a few pizzas to the Hungry Black Hole space station? We've been been craving some Martian cuisine.
easy.completion_message: Great job, you've managed to satisfy the Hungry Black Hole's craving for pizza! Hope you got a good tip from the vacuum.

easy.description: Hello there! Deliver some food and water to the Hungry Black Hole space station before it eats everything else!
easy.completion_message: Congratulations, you managed to feed the Hungry Black Hole without being swallowed! You truly are out of this world.

easy.description: Heyoo! Deliver metal and solar panels to the Sunburnt space station, but be careful not to get burned! Watch out for the solar panels, they break easily!
easy.completion_message: Well done, you've helped the Sunburnt space station become less dependent on sunscreen. Keep shining!

medium.description: Good day sir! Might you be so kind to transport food and water to the Spacey McSpaceface space station. It's a long trip, so bring some snacks.
medium.completion_message: Great job, you've successfully delivered supplies to the Spacey McSpaceface space station. Looks like they won't be running out of snacks anytime soon!

medium.description: Hi! Cou-could you ple-ple-please deliver us some neutronium and ammo to the Neutron Nerd space station? Please handle them with care, this stuff is explosive!
medium.completion_message: Congratulations, you've safely delivered the neutronium and ammo to the Neutron Nerd space station without causing a cosmic explosion. You're a star!

medium.description: Howdy Partner! Deliver food and water to the Hungry Black Hole space station before it eats everything else. Please hurry!
medium.completion_message: Congratulations, you managed to feed the Hungry Black Hole without being swallowed! Amazing what this little ship can do!

hard.description: Wassup!! Transport a shipment of metal and ammo to the Iron Maiden space station. It's located in a hazardous asteroid field, so be careful!
hard.completion_message: You've successfully delivered metal and ammo to the Iron Maiden space station. The space pirates won't know what hit them!

hard.description: Hello there! Deliver food, water, metal, and solar panels to the Hungry Black Hole space station. I you
hard.completion_message: Congratulations, you've successfully delivered supplies to the Hungry Black Hole space station, despite the dangerous conditions. You truly are an interstellar hero!

hard.description: Heyoo! Transport a large shipment of solar panels to the Sunburnt space station. We need a LOT of energy for, hmm... you don't need to know.
hard.completion_message: Well done, you've managed to transport a massive amount of solar panels to the Sunburnt space station. Looks like you've earned your space shipper license!
